00041 #ifndef __LIBCFS_LINUX_CFS_FS_H__
00042 #define __LIBCFS_LINUX_CFS_FS_H__
00043 
00044 #ifndef __LIBCFS_LIBCFS_H__
00045 #error Do not #include this file directly. #include <libcfs/libcfs.h> instead
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00049 #error This include is only for kernel use.
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #include <linux/fs.h>
00053 #include <linux/stat.h>
00054 #include <linux/mount.h>
00055 #include <linux/backing-dev.h>
00056 #include <linux/posix_acl_xattr.h>
00057 
00058 #if defined(HAVE_FILE_FSYNC_4ARGS) || defined(HAVE_FILE_FSYNC_2ARGS)
00059 #define ll_vfs_fsync_range(fp, start, end, datasync) \
00060         vfs_fsync_range(fp, start, end, datasync)
00061 #else
00062 #define ll_vfs_fsync_range(fp, start, end, datasync) \
00063         vfs_fsync_range(fp, (fp)->f_path.dentry, start, end, datasync)
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #define flock_type(fl)                  ((fl)->fl_type)
00067 #define flock_set_type(fl, type)        do { (fl)->fl_type = (type); } while (0)
00068 #define flock_pid(fl)                   ((fl)->fl_pid)
00069 #define flock_set_pid(fl, pid)          do { (fl)->fl_pid = (pid); } while (0)
00070 #define flock_start(fl)                 ((fl)->fl_start)
00071 #define flock_set_start(fl, st)         do { (fl)->fl_start = (st); } while (0)
00072 #define flock_end(fl)                   ((fl)->fl_end)
00073 #define flock_set_end(fl, end)          do { (fl)->fl_end = (end); } while (0)
00074 
00075 #ifndef IFSHIFT
00076 #define IFSHIFT                 12
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #ifndef IFTODT
00080 #define IFTODT(type)            (((type) & S_IFMT) >> IFSHIFT)
00081 #endif
00082 #ifndef DTTOIF
00083 #define DTTOIF(dirtype)         ((dirtype) << IFSHIFT)
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #ifndef HAVE_POSIXACL_USER_NS
00087 /*
00088  * Mask out &init_user_ns so we don't jump
00089  * through hoops to define it somehow only
00090  * to have it ignored anyway.
00091  */
00092 #define posix_acl_from_xattr(a,b,c)     posix_acl_from_xattr(b,c)
00093 #define posix_acl_to_xattr(a,b,c,d)     posix_acl_to_xattr(b,c,d)
00094 #endif
00095 #endif
